name: Smell-Good-Man!
description:
This is my entry for the Weekly Game Jam: Week 2005 with the theme: 'Unconventional Superpowers'.

I went for a SUPER bad C64 inspired visual design with just a few "modern" touches.

SFX and Music is borrowed from free assets on Itch.io. Will update with right credits as son as I find them again *faceplam*

The Story:
In a city full of hard-and over worked citizens, they don't have the time to think about hygiene. So its up to you: Smell-Good-Man! To make everyone smell peachy save the day!
